message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $80 to me. Considering its quality and features, I believe it's a great value for you too. Let's start with an offer of $95. Looking forward to your response!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to make sure it's a good value for me.
